function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density in urban areas","Impact":"Greater spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation measures, promote vaccination campaigns, and create public health awareness programs","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, contactless delivery systems, and health monitoring technologies","People":"Residents of densely populated urban areas","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Limited access to outdoor space in urban centers","Impact":"Increased risk of mental and physical health issues due to lack of outdoor exposure","Mitigation":"Develop and maintain urban green spaces, promote community gardening initiatives, and encourage outdoor recreational activities","Technologies":"Urban planning software for green space allocation, smart irrigation systems, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"Residents of urban centers, especially those living in flats","Owner":"Local governments and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on access to outdoor spaces","Impact":"Restriction of outdoor access increases mental health challenges and reduces physical activity","Mitigation":"Implement measures to safely reopen public outdoor spaces, enhance cleaning and sanitation protocols, and promote responsible use of outdoor areas","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems for park facilities, crowd monitoring technologies, and mobile apps for park reservations","People":"Citizens affected by confinement restrictions","Owner":"Local governments and public health authorities"}]}
